sqlMap.select:
select id, name, description, level, hp, hp_pre, attack_min, attack_min_pre, attack_max, attack_max_pre, defence, defence_pre, crit, crit_pre, parry, parry_pre, constitution, constitution_pre, forces, forces_pre, agility, agility_pre, intelligence, intelligence_pre, speed, append_position, type, max_append, legacy, room, name_pinyin, embedable, is_equiped, is_used, is_exchange, is_sell, dropable, is_save, life, bind_type_id, buff_num, is_implove, is_log, sect_id, color_id, price, gold, max_amount, icon, item_suit_id, position, rebound, un_defence, implove_level, cooling_time, auto_hp, auto_hp_pre from item
order by $orderByClause$

select id, name, description, level, hp, hp_pre, attack_min, attack_min_pre, attack_max, attack_max_pre, defence, defence_pre, crit, crit_pre, parry, parry_pre, constitution, constitution_pre, forces, forces_pre, agility, agility_pre, intelligence, intelligence_pre, speed, append_position, type, max_append, legacy, room, name_pinyin, embedable, is_equiped, is_used, is_exchange, is_sell, dropable, is_save, life, bind_type_id, buff_num, is_implove, is_log, sect_id, color_id, price, gold, max_amount, icon, item_suit_id, position, rebound, un_defence, implove_level, cooling_time, auto_hp, auto_hp_pre from item where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into item (name, description, level, hp, hp_pre, attack_min, attack_min_pre, attack_max, attack_max_pre, defence, defence_pre, crit, crit_pre, parry, parry_pre, constitution, constitution_pre, forces, forces_pre, agility, agility_pre, intelligence, intelligence_pre, speed, append_position, type, max_append, legacy, room, name_pinyin, embedable, is_equiped, is_used, is_exchange, is_sell, dropable, is_save, life, bind_type_id, buff_num, is_implove, is_log, sect_id, color_id, price, gold, max_amount, icon, item_suit_id, position, rebound, un_defence, implove_level, cooling_time, auto_hp, auto_hp_pre) values (#name:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #level:INTEGER#, #hp:INTEGER#, #hpPre:INTEGER#, #attackMin:INTEGER#, #attackMinPre:INTEGER#, #attackMax:INTEGER#, #attackMaxPre:INTEGER#, #defence:INTEGER#, #defencePre:INTEGER#, #crit:INTEGER#, #critPre:INTEGER#, #parry:INTEGER#, #parryPre:INTEGER#, #constitution:INTEGER#, #constitutionPre:INTEGER#, #forces:INTEGER#, #forcesPre:INTEGER#, #agility:INTEGER#, #agilityPre:INTEGER#, #intelligence:INTEGER#, #intelligencePre:INTEGER#, #speed:INTEGER#, #appendPosition:VARCHAR#, #type:INTEGER#, #maxAppend:INTEGER#, #legacy:BIT#, #room:INTEGER#, #namePinyin:VARCHAR#, #embedable:BIT#, #isEquiped:BIT#, #isUsed:BIT#, #isExchange:BIT#, #isSell:BIT#, #dropable:BIT#, #isSave:BIT#, #life:INTEGER#, #bindTypeId:INTEGER#, #buffNum:INTEGER#, #isImplove:BIT#, #isLog:BIT#, #sectId:INTEGER#, #colorId:INTEGER#, #price:INTEGER#, #gold:INTEGER#, #maxAmount:INTEGER#, #icon:VARCHAR#, #itemSuitId:INTEGER#, #position:INTEGER#, #rebound:INTEGER#, #unDefence:INTEGER#, #imploveLevel:INTEGER#, #coolingTime:INTEGER#, #autoHp:INTEGER#, #autoHpPre:INTEGER#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
